name: rw136
description:
Unfolding of a rw136 sparse matrix into a lattice. The original matrix describes a Markov chain random walk model first documented by G. Stewart in 1978. In this simulation, the matrix is represented as a lattice with 136 nodes which undergoes a process of unfolding until it reaches equilibrium. 

@lukapiskorec, mp4, 1000 x 1000 pix, 200 frames
